General.Name: Jerasia Capital Bhd
General.Description: Jerasia Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail of fashion apparels, accessories, and personal protective equipment in Malaysia and the United States. It operates through Garment Manufacturing and Retail segments. The company offers various ladies' apparel, such as dresses, ensembles or co-ordinates, jackets, pants, skirts, and sleepwear. It operates 30 Trio outlets and an online store. The company also exports its products. Jerasia Capital Berhad is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
